DocAttribute.Name: RoundingRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Radius of the circular arcs, by which all four corners of the rectangle are equally rounded. If not given, zero (= no rounding arcs) applies.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The value of the attribute RoundingRadius shall be lower or equal than either of both, half the value of the Xdim and the YDim attribute.
